Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
SUMMERHILL ESTATE, BOTANIC RIDGE: This well-renowned development is coming along in leaps and bounds. With a beautiful mix of impressive properties surrounded by parks, gardens and wetlands, this is a truly serene place to call home!
For those who demand the very best, sprawling dimensions and a spectacular design unite in this glamorous 4 bedroom home to showcase the lifestyle package of your dreams with every contemporary accoutrement delivered.
Well built by Porter Davis in 2017, beyond the entry hall you'll discover a generous living room, grand theatre, gallery and lounge - and that's just the beginning. A state-of-the-art kitchen is fitted with thick stone counter tops, dual ovens, dishwasher and a butler's pantry. All this and a whole lot more overlooking the dedicated dining room!
Spread across an impressive 44 squares under-roofline, each of the 4 bedrooms reside on the upper level beside the 4th living room to help spoil the clan - each who'll enjoy a walk in robe and private ensuite off their bedroom, including his-and-her robes and a full ensuite with a soaker tub running off the grand master retreat.
A large study, wide oak floorboards, wool carpeting, porcelain tiling, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gas fireplace and surround sound speakers only hint at the level of luxury awaiting, while those who love to entertain will relish a choice of alfresco areas set amongst the private garden setting.
Overlooking the Acacia Wetlands and only app. 900 metres to the recently opened Botanic Ridge Primary School, this exclusive new estate is in close proximity to walking trails, the Settler's Run Golf and Country Club and the Casey Race Recreation and Aquatic Centre!
Positioned in a safe and secure pocket of this burgeoning estate you are also within metres of the picturesque waterways with easy access to the Cultural Heritage Reserve and Summerhill Park. The scene is set for a lifestyle full of peace and tranquility!
Summerhill is setting a new standard in Botanic Ridge with special and considered features that make the community unique. An exclusive address for fewer than 200 spacious and elegant homes, this estate has been designed to blend in perfectly with the natural environment surrounding. Nestled in between the Royal Botanic Gardens and the popular Acacia community, the development will also include a formal estate entrance point, beautifully landscaped parks, native streetscapes, charming natural stone accents, designed wetlands and wide tree-lined streets.
Other features include Botanic Village, a local shopping hub positioned in the neighbouring estate, Acacia, complete with its own supermarket, cafe and speciality stores plus a future community centre. Sports and recreational fields have also been proposed!
Sensational location within close proximity to all of the amenities on offer in the established townships of Cranbourne and Pearcedale. If you are a golf enthusiast then chuck the clubs in the boot as the well known 18-hole Greg Norman designed course is literally minutes away!

Description:
A PICTURE PERFECT OPPORTUNITY IN THE POPULAR HUNT CLUB ESTATE!
HUNT CLUB ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST: In what was the first of many estates creating the Cranbourne East we know today, this home is set in the heart of the highly sought after and award winning Hunt Club precinct within a very quiet court like setting. Only moments away from all local amenities, 2 Gallop Close is an immediate addition to your property inspection shortlist.
Ideal as a first home or portfolio building investment, this freshly painted gem is designed for low maintenance living which perfectly suits today's busy lifestyles. Nestled on a care free block the home features a central hallway, open plan lounge/dining room with gas heating and RC/SS air-conditioning plus a brand new hostess kitchen complete with a handy breakfast bar and stainless appliances including a double oven and dishwasher.
Don't forget the 3 robed bedrooms, including the master with a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite style access to the dual entry modernised bathroom with separate powder room facilities.
Outside you will be greeted by a single garage with remote door and secure internal access as well as an easy care backyard featuring a paved pergola - the perfect place for relaxing and entertaining with family and friends!
Within close proximity to picturesque wetlands and walking/bike paths the Hunt Club is a multi-award winning estate offering a complete range of education facilities including a childcare centre, Cranbourne East Primary and Cranbourne East Secondary College. Buses weave through the estate whilst the recently opened Hunt Club Village has an array of shopping options. High speed broadband and environmentally friendly designs add to the overall appeal of this family orientated location!
The position is second to none. Centrally located to freeways and public transport en route to the Melbourne CBD which is only approx. 40 minutes away. For those of you who like to stay closer to home it's only a brisk drive to the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Berwick Village, Fountain Gate, the Casey Lifestyle Centre and the Casey Fields Sporting Complex. Within close vicinity to an array of further primary, secondary and tertiary institutions, the entire family has easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation!
